## Speaker
Chen Wei

### Theme
An Introduction to Topological String Theory (1)

### Abstract
We discuss Marcos Mariño's notes from the introduction up to Section 3.2, covering Calabi–Yau manifolds and the A-model, without yet discussing the physical motivations.
